title: Gangplank or Karthus?
body:
Gangplank or Karthus? I love them both equally, but I haven't played them in a while, so I just want one that's more strong,  fun and enjoyable to play. Atm I'm looking more into gangplank (due to his rumoured revamps) but am not far off from Karthus either...

So which one? 

Thanks...

replies.body: Its not a rumour, he is getting a rework.
How do you know of this though?

> [{quoted}](name=Saythes,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=FtP7aEPR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-07T15:04:22.246+0000)
>
> How do you know of this though?

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/05/red-post-collection-gp-and-mf-on.html

just play whatever you enjoy bruh. 
Nothing wrong with playing both champs as well
CritPlank {{champion:41}} is the most unique do everything champion.
